title: Ticket #2606: EC2 jobs should clear EC2InstanceName and EC2RemoteVirtualMachineName
description: On re-execution of EC2 jobs the EC2InstanceName and EC2RemoteVirtualMachineName attributes are not cleared, providing inaccurate information until the job is running again and they are overwritten. A state exists to handle this case, GM_CLEAR_REQUEST, in ec2job.cpp.
